notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: P.K.; designed and performed the experiments, analyzed and discussed the data and wrote the paper, N.P.; designed the experiments and prepared media and reagents, S.C.; provided both guidance and materials for the study, M.W.; provided materials for the study in C. elegans, M.W. and T.T. conceived and supervised research, M.W. and T.T.; corrected the manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
